name: World Champion Icehockey
overview: An ice hockey game where you can play for either the world cup or choose a practice match. World cup play can include up to 9 players. On the ice there are two teams that face each other and put the puck into the goal. The winner is whoever has managed to do this the most at the end of 90 seconds plus a possible overtime. You control one player at a time and you can recognize him by his jersey color. The computer will try to allow you control of the player closest to the puck. The Italian version named Hockey Pista changed the game description have the game be roller hockey and refers to the puck as a ball. It was published in International Games n.7 (luglio/agosto 1991).
